name: Tree Tapper
description:
It's simple, just click/tap to plant trees. Reach enough saplings and hire workers to plant more trees, send out seeding drones and more. Grow your forest and keep upgrading your resources!

For the best experience, pleas splay in full screen mode! There is an unidentified issue with the games scaling outside of full screen mode


Tree Tapper is a game made for the Ukie Green Jam where the theme of the jam was Climate change and sustainability. We made this idle clicker with hope to support the #teamtrees campaign. #ukiegreenjam2019

Made by Team Foxtrot, a team of 6 students studying at Abertay Univeristy.

Follow for progress updates on the game @TeamFoxtrot_19 on Twitter!

Alex, Charlotte, Connor, David, Jakub and Joe.
